snippet.title: The Hidden Below Intro w/ captions! (GER/ENG)
snippet.description:
Intro and Opening Credits for The Hidden Below, created in 1994 by Soft Enterprises.  For some unknown reason, this nice intro was later cut from the game via a patch.

The intro goes through the story a little quickly, the story is much better told in the manual (available at http://www.TheHiddenBelow.com)

I have added German and English Captions for your enjoyment.

Please check out The Hidden Below Fansite: http://www.TheHiddenBelow.com
